Package com.iontrading.mkv

Class MkvLogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iontrading.mkv.MkvLogManager
  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public class MkvLogManager
extends Object
    This class provides access to the log facilities exported by this API.

    Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor or method in this interface will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.

    See Also:
    Mkv.getLogManager()

    • Method Detail

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
        Overrides:
        finalize in class Object

      • createLogFile

        public MkvLog createLogFile​(String name)
        Creates a new Log service which stores data on a file, using global user-defined configuration.

        Log files are kept open and new log files are created for every day of execution. File names will be called name_dd_MM_yyyy.log where name is the argument passed to this method.

        Parameters:
        name - The log identifier
        Returns:
        a new MkvLog instance or null if a log services with the given identifier has already been created
        See Also:
        closeLogFile(String), MkvLog, MkvProperties.getDefaultLogFileQoS(), MkvLogFileQoS

      • createLogFile

        public MkvLog createLogFile​(String name,
                            MkvLogFileQoS qos)
        Creates a new Log service which stores data on a file, specifying a MkvLogFileQoS configuration object.

        Log files are kept open and new log files are created for every day of execution. File names will be called name_dd_MM_yyyy.log where name is the argument passed to this method.

        Parameters:
        name - The log identifier.
        qos - The MkvLogFileQoS configuration object.
        Returns:
        a new MkvLog instance or null if a log services with the given identifier has already been created
        See Also:
        closeLogFile(String), MkvLog, MkvProperties.getDefaultLogFileQoS(), MkvLogFileQoS

      • createOrGetLogFile

        public MkvLogExt createOrGetLogFile​(String name)

      • createOrGetLogFile

        public MkvLogExt createOrGetLogFile​(String name,
                                    MkvLogFileQoS qos)

      • closeLogFile

        public void closeLogFile​(String name)
        Close the specified Log-on-file service.

        This operation may cause a flow block due to file-system operations even if the LogFile has been set in asynchronous mode.

        Parameters:
        name - The log identifier
        See Also:
        createLogFile(String), createLogFile(String, MkvLogFileQoS), MkvLog, MkvProperties.getDefaultLogFileQoS(), MkvLogFileQoS

      • getLogFile

        public MkvLog getLogFile​(String name)
        Retrieves an existent Log-on-file service
        Parameters:
        name - The log identifier
        Returns:
        a MkvLog instance or null if a log services with the given identifier has not been created

      • addLogSplitListener

        public boolean addLogSplitListener​(String name,
                                   MkvLogSplitListener splitListener)
        Add an application listener to get notified when a new split file is created for the specified log file name.
        Parameters:
        name - The interesting log name
        splitListener - the MkvLogSplitListener listener
        Returns:
        true on success (if the log file exist), false otherwise

      • removeLogSplitListener

        public boolean removeLogSplitListener​(String name,
                                      MkvLogSplitListener splitListener)
        Remove an application listener to get notified when a new split file is created for the specified log file name.
        Parameters:
        name - The interesting log name
        splitListener - the MkvLogSplitListener listener
        Returns:
        true on success (if the log file exist and the listener is present), false otherwise
